AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Aetheryte technician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a technician responsible for building, maintaining, and repairing aetherytes throughout Eorzea. [PAWN_pronoun] was skilled at both construction and repair, and often had to maintain [PAWN_possessive] own tools and equipment as well

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Apothecary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living distilling and selling potions, tinctures, and other medicinal alchemical mixtures. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to grow some of [PAWN_possessive] own herbs as well as basic Medicine knowledge to as to offer better consultation for ailing customers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Calamity salvager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living performing the grim task of salvaging materials and valuables out of areas devastated by the Seventh Umbral Calamity.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Camp cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living cooking meals for workers, researchers, and soldiers in the field. [PAWN_pronoun] often had to make do with limited supplies and equipment and supplemented [PAWN_possessive] stock by gathering wild ingredients.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Caravan guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a guard for merchant caravans traveling across Eorzea. [PAWN_pronoun] was skilled at dealing with both bandits and monsters and also supplemented caravan rations with the occasional hunted animal.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chirurgeon
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a skilled chirurgeon for one of the city-states of Eorzea. [PAWN_pronoun] is adept at mending grievous wounds sustained in battle against both monsters and men.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chocobokeep
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a chocobokeep at various locations, renting trained chocobos out to travelers, merchants, and messengers. [PAWN_pronoun] took good care of the birds and dealt with customers on a daily basis.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Company quartermaster
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a quartermaster for one of the Grand Companies. [PAWN_pronoun] maintained and issued equipment and supplies to company personnel.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gatherer retainer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a retainer for the Adventurer's Guild. [PAWN_pronoun] helped adventurers store [PAWN_possessive] posessions, sold consigned items on marketboards, and explored the wilds to search for and retrieve rare materials.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gysahl farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew gysahl greens as feed for local chocobo stables. [PAWN_pronoun] often personally helped attend to the birds as well and took great pride in ensuring that they were well-fed and happy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hunter retainer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a retainer for the Adventurer's Guild. [PAWN_pronoun] helped adventurers store [PAWN_possessive] posessions, sold consigned items on marketboards, and explored the wilds to search for and retrieve rare materials.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hunter-scholar
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a hunter-scholar. [PAWN_pronoun] tracked and hunted dangerous beasts and creatures shared [PAWN_possessive] knowledge with other would-be hunters in order to see such threats eliminated.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Innkeeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a small inn for travelers and adventurers. [PAWN_pronoun] welcomed customers, cooked and served food, and took care of [PAWN_possessive] customers' mounts

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ironworks technician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a technician for the Garlond Ironworks, researching, building, and maintaining Magitek devices for the benefit of Eorzea.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Junkmonger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] made a job out of finding and salvaging bits and bobs that others discarded, restoring them, and selling them to customers seeking obscure odds and ends.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Landscape painter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled across Eorzea, preserving the beauty of the land in the form of paint on canvas. [PAWN_pronoun] bargained with dealers and customers alike, and also learned to supplement [PAWN_possessive] art supplies with natural materials.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mark hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] tracked and killed marks for The Hunt, fighting dangerous monsters and beasts all over Eorzea. [PAWN_pronoun] spent a great deal of time in the wilds and often had to forage for food and supplies during long tracks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Merchant & mender
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] operated a small shop for maintaining and fixing travelers' and adventurers' gear and equipment. [PAWN_pronoun] also sold replacement items to those whose gear were beyond repair.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Scion agent
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a liaison for the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, investigating and reporting on beast tribe and primal activity. [PAWN_pronoun] also trained to fight, for when direct and immediate intervention was a necessity.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wood Wailer lancer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a lancer of the Wood Wailers of Gridania. [PAWN_pronoun] is well-trained in melee combat and has served as bodyguard, law enforcer, and militia.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gods' Quiver archer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as an archer of the Gods' Quiver in Gridania. [PAWN_pronoun] is skilled with the use of bows as well as the protection and conservation of the Twelveswood.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Keeper of the Entwined Serpents
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as an honor guard for the Order of the Twin Adders. [PAWN_pronoun] participated in important ceremonies as well as serving as a personal bodyguard and assistant to high-ranking leaders.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Quarrymill hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living as a hunter in Quarrymill, one of the few places in the Twelveswood where hunting was allowed. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught to take only that which was needed and maintain balance in the forest.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shroud poacher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living poaching game in the Black Shroud. [PAWN_pronoun] hunted animals for meat and valuable materials while hiding from the Wood Wailers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chicken farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] raised chickens in Gridania, making a living selling the eggs to local residents. [PAWN_pronoun] was also an expert in chicken feed due to the curious demands of [PAWN_possessive] flock.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gelmorran archaeologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an archaeologist who studied the ancient Gelmorran ruins beneath the Black Shroud. [PAWN_pronoun] also decided that studying the local flora might be a good idea after an unfortunate run-in with some poisonous plants.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bentbranch breeder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a chocobo breeder and trainer at Bentbranch Meadows. [PAWN_pronoun] raised [PAWN_possessive] birds with care and pride and also experimented with gysahl-based fodders to ensure that they would grow up strong and healthy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Atrium carpenter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a carpenter for the Oak Atrium. [PAWN_pronoun] is skilled at making everything from bows and spears to furniture and toys.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Greatloam botanist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a botanist for the Greatloam Growery. [PAWN_pronoun] is skilled in the growing and harvesting of plants, as well as the conservation of natural resources.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Greatloam potter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as an assistant at the Greatloam Growery. [PAWN_pronoun] dug up clay and turned it into a vast amount of pottery used at the Growery for moving and selling live plants.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fen-Yll leatherworker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a leatherworker for Atelier Fen-Yll. [PAWN_pronoun] is skilled at making both armor and fashion accessories out of leather.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Amphitheatre performer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a performer at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre. [PAWN_pronoun] entertained patrons of all ages and walks and life, including both Gridania natives and foreign dignitaries alike.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Waterwheel fixer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in Gridania as a waterwheel fixer. [PAWN_pronoun] was responsible for repairing and maintaining the wooden contraptions throughout the city and neighboring Twelveswood.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fullflower beekeeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as an assistant at the Fullflower Comb. [PAWN_pronoun] tended to the hives, collected honey to be turned into mead, and occasionally helped do repairs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fullflower meadmaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as an assistant at the Fullflower Comb. [PAWN_pronoun] experimented with honey made from different flower pollens to find the best taste.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fallgourd handyman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a handyman at Fallgourd Float. [PAWN_pronoun] repaired and maintained the floating buildings and bridges as well as the roads leading in and out of the settlement.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bobbing Cork host
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] provided hospitality at The Bobbing Cork in Fallgourd Float. [PAWN_pronoun] provided meals and accomodations to travelers and adventurers visiting the settlement.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mun-Tuy brewer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at the Mun-Tuy Cellars as a brewer. [PAWN_pronoun] was responsible for helping produce the Cellars' signature Mun-Tuy sauce and Mun-Tuy brew as well as occasionally mending or repairing the casks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Canopy server
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a server in the Carline Canopy. [PAWN_pronoun] served food and provided accomodations and information to travelers, merchants, and adventurers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lominsan privateer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as crew on a privateer vessel under the command of the Admiralty. [PAWN_pronoun] scrubbed the deck and performed repairs on the ship when not boarding enemy vessels.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lominsan captain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a hired captain for one of many ships calling Limsa Lominsa home. [PAWN_pronoun] wasa adept at keeping [PAWN_possessive] crew productive and effective and getting consigned cargo to its destination on time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lominsan gunner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a gunner on a privateer vessel under the command of the Admiralty. [PAWN_pronoun] was skilled with the maintenance and use of cannons, muskets, and pistols alike.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tower marauder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a marauder of the Coral Tower. [PAWN_pronoun] trained with the axe and worked alongside other members of The Maelstrom to protect Limsa Lominsa.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Edelweiss rogue
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of the Rogue's Guild at the convent of the Dutiful Sisters of the Edelweiss. [PAWN_pronoun] punished those who broke the unspoken code of conduct of Limsa, which required no small amount of investigation and greasing palms.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Aleport smuggler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] smuggled illicit goods in and out of Aleport. [PAWN_pronoun] had an eye for valuables, is adept at greasing palms, and isn't shy about knifework if the situation demands it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Den drill sergeant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a drill sergeant at the Wolf's Den. [PAWN_pronoun] trained adventurers and oversaw duels and sparring to prepare them for Alliance war games and maneuvers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gate assessor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as an assessor at Mealvaan's Gate. [PAWN_pronoun] inspected goods going in and out of Limsa Lominsa, and developed quite an eye for art and other goods.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Moraby shipwright
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a shipwright at the Moraby Drydocks. [PAWN_pronoun] helped construct and repair ships for the Admiralty, and as a result became pretty good at recognizing good lumber as well.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Guild blacksmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for the Blacksmith's Guild of Naldiq & Vymelli's. [PAWN_pronoun] forged weapons and tools alike for clients and added [PAWN_possessive] own artistic flair when they could.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Guild armorer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for the Armorer's Guild of Naldiq's & Vymelli's. [PAWN_pronoun] forged armor and helmets for the Maelstrom and private clients alike.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bismarck culinarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as an assistant chef at The Bismarck. [PAWN_pronoun] studied under some of the best culinarians in Eorzea and gained an expert eye for quality ingredients.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bottom fisherman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at the guild at Fisherman's Bottom. [PAWN_pronoun] tended to the live fish kept at the guild, advised others on [PAWN_possessive] culinary value, and also helped produce bait for other fishermen.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Alley hawker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a small time merchant and mender in Hawker's Alley. [PAWN_pronoun] mended tools, weapons, and equipment and sold replacements for things too work to be restored.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Red Rooster shepherd
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a shepherd at Red Rooster Stead. [PAWN_pronoun] raised sheep for wool and mutton.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Grey Fleet miller
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at the grain mills of Grey Fleet. [PAWN_pronoun] helped produce the Fleet's signature flour, as well as occasionally helping fix the mill equipment.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Resort dancer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a dancer at Costa del Sol. [PAWN_pronoun] was responsible for entertaining guests as well as occasionally serving drinks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Resort chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a chef at Costa del Sol. [PAWN_pronoun] cooked meals, mixed drinks, and delighted both eyes and tongues with [PAWN_possessive] culinary artistry.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wineport vintner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a vintner at Wineport. [PAWN_pronoun] tended the vines, produced fine wines, and occasionally fixed the odd damaged cask.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Summerford farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a sellsword-turned-plowshare at Summerford Farms. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to grow oranges and other signature La Noscean crops, and [PAWN_possessive] past as a pirate helped them fend off the occasional wild beast.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mirage pugilist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] trained at the Pugilist's Guild in Ul'dah. [PAWN_pronoun] became adept at fighting with [PAWN_possessive] fists, participated in bouts at the Coliseum, and occasionally served as security at the Platinum Mirage casino.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Coliseum gladiator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] fought on the bloodsands of the Coliseum for the entertainment of the crowd. [PAWN_pronoun] was skilled with blade and shield, knew the value of playing up the audience, and became passing adept at treating cuts and bruises sustained in combat.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sultansworn guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was as a member of the Sultansworn of Ul'dah. [PAWN_pronoun] was skilled with sword and blade and served as an honor guard in the royal palace.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bluefog guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a member of the Ceruleum Processing Plant garrison. [PAWN_pronoun] made a living doing the dangerous work of defending the area from Garlean intrusion as well as protecting the stores of ceruleum from monsters such as grenades that were attracted to the highly volatile substance.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Stone Torch guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for the Stone Torches as a guard for Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern. [PAWN_pronoun] helped protect the Concern's outposts and ore shipments from bandits and thieves.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Highbridge guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was stationed as a guard at Highbridge. [PAWN_pronoun] defended the area from qiqirn and amal'jaa incursions and protected travelers heading to and from the Black Shroud.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sapphire loan shark
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a loan shark near the Sapphire Avenue Exchange. [PAWN_pronoun] provided funds to desperate merchants and gamblers, and exacted punishment on those who couldn't pay off [PAWN_possessive] debts.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Quicksand server
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a server in the Quicksand, the most popular inn in Ul'dah. [PAWN_pronoun] provided food, drink, accomodations, and information to travelers and adventurers passing through.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ossuary librarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] assisted at the Arrzaneth Ossuary as a keeper of its library of arcane tomes. [PAWN_pronoun] became well-versed in knowledge both practical and esoteric and occasionally mended worn-out books as well.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Aesthetics goldsmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of the Ul'dah Goldsmith's Guild contracted to Eshtaime's Aesthetics. [PAWN_pronoun] produced and repaired high-end jewelry and decor for wealthy clients.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Guild miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a miner for the Ul'dah Miner's Guild. [PAWN_pronoun] is adept at unearthing the riches of the earth in the form of both valuable ores and gemstones.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Guild weaver
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of the Ul'dah Weaver's Guild. [PAWN_pronoun] became skilled at producing fashionable clothing for wealthy clients.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Phrontistery alchemist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as an alchemist for Frondale's Phrontistery. [PAWN_pronoun] was skilled at brewing potions, elixirs, and other alchemical concoctions, and became decent at diagnosing ailments.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cove fishwife
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a spouse to a fisherman of Crescent Cove. [PAWN_pronoun] cooked, cleaned, took care of the house, and mended the nets.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Black Brush smelter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a smelter at Black Brush Station. [PAWN_pronoun] helped with the dirty work of turning unrefined ore into valuable metals for Ul'dah's goldsmiths.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ceruleum worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at the Ceruleum Processing Plant in Northern Thanalan. [PAWN_pronoun] did the gloomy, dirty, and dangerous work of extracting ceruleum from the earth and processing it into fuel for magitek devices.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lichyard caretaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a caretaker at the Church of Saint Adama Landama. [PAWN_pronoun] tended to the lichyard, dug graves, and helped perform final rites for those interred there.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gold Saucer attendant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served as an attendant at the Manderville Gold Saucer. [PAWN_pronoun] directed customers, participated in performances and events, and served refreshments.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Drybone florist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a florist at Camp Drybone. [PAWN_pronoun] procured and sold flowers to visitors come to mourn the dead in the nearby lichyard, a difficult task in a parched desert.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Refugee aidworker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in Little Ala Mhigo as an aid worker. [PAWN_pronoun] provided assistance to the refugees, helping with provisions and Medicine care.
